data.title: Chip8 Emulator
data.description: CHIP-8 emulator/VM using Java 11 and Swing/AWT for the UI. It is open-sourced in Github. Check more about CHIP-8 in Wikipedia.

data.title: Make Pretty XML
data.description: Easy to use tool to present XML in a readable format. The project is structured using RequireJS, Backbone.js and jQuery. It is open-sourced in Github.

data.title: MomoURU Biblioteca
data.description: Unofficial access to the Library catalog of the Universidad Rafael Urdaneta (Rafael Urdaneta University).

data.title: MomoURU
data.description: Unofficial access for the Student Services system of the Universidad Rafael Urdaneta (Rafael Urdaneta University). It consists of three modules to see the student's Grades, Schedule and Payments.

data.title: Bilumin
data.description:
Bilumin is an abstract themed game where you control two luminescent spheres or "lumins". You must rotate them to get other small lumins while avoiding the obstacles that fall in between. There will be powerups that keep coming down that affect the behaviour to help (or not) your performance.

I worked as co-designer and lead programmer of this game, using a custom framework built on top of the Android SDK.

data.title: Squarebot
data.description:
The goal of the game is to remember the most steps of an automatically generated sequence, while the speed gradually increases as the bot teaches it to you. Challenge your memory with this simple but addictive game. Win achievements and compete with your friends in the online rankings, or globally with other players.

I worked as co-designer and lead programmer of this game, using a custom framework built on top of the Android SDK.

data.title: Starship Constructor
data.description:
You will have to help an alien named Bult to construct as many starships as possible within the time limit, after a meteorite crash on his moon that wrecked all of his work. But it won't be that easy, because to construct much more starships you'll have to sharpen your reflexes and hurry up to best your score.

I worked as co-designer and lead programmer of this game, using a custom framework built on top of the Android SDK. I also recorded and produced all sounds and musical pieces.

data.media: Waldou · Somos Heroes
data.title: Somos Heroes
data.description: I'm the former songwriter, singer and guitar player of the band Somos Heroes. This is an extract of the only EP released by the band, 'Inténtalo Otra Vez'. Two of these songs, '16' and 'Estrella' where featured on MTV Demo, winners on both pop and rock categories respectively.

data.media: Waldou · Starship Constructor
data.title: Starship Constructor Music
data.description: Songs for a puzzle game for Android. There was a third unused song composed early in the development process.
